analyzer/odb_check/include/WireMap.hh

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**************************************
00002 Class: WireMap
00003 Author: John R. Quirk
00004 
00005 The WireMap contains some rough information from the ODB wiremap.
00006 Specifically the run, banks/detectors/status, pedestals,
00007 polarities, and offsets.
00008 **************************************/
00009 
00010 #ifndef WIREMAP_H__
00011 #define WIREMAP_H__
00012 
00013 #include <vector>
00014 #include <string>
00015 
00016 class WireMap {
00017 private:
00018   unsigned int fRun;
00019   unsigned int fNDets;
00020   std::vector<std::string> fBankName;
00021   std::vector<std::string> fDetName;
00022   std::vector<bool> fEnabled;
00023   std::vector<int> fPedestal;
00024   std::vector<int> fPolarity;
00025   std::vector<int> fOffset;
00026   std::vector<double> fFrequency;
00027 
00028 public:
00029   enum key_t { BANK, DETECTOR, ENABLED,
00030                PEDESTAL, POLARITY, TIMESHIFT,
00031                FREQUENCY, UNKNOWN };
00032 
00033 public:
00034   WireMap();
00035   WireMap(int run, std::string& odb_file);
00036 
00037 public:
00038   // Setters
00039   void SetRun(unsigned int);
00040   void Enable(); // Enable last channel added
00041   bool Enable(unsigned int); // Return true if succesful
00042   void Disable(); // Disable last channel added
00043   bool Disable(unsigned int); // Return true if succesful
00044   // Getters
00045   unsigned int GetRun() const;
00046   unsigned int GetNDets() const;
00047   std::vector<std::string>& GetBanks();
00048   std::vector<std::string>& GetDets();
00049   std::vector<bool>& GetEnableds();
00050   std::vector<int>& GetPedestals();
00051   std::vector<int>& GetPolarities();
00052   std::vector<int>& GetOffsets();
00053   std::vector<double>& GetFrequencies();
00054 
00055   // Add new value
00056   void Add(const char bankname[], const char detname[], bool en, int ped, int pol, int off, double freq);
00057   void Add(std::string& bankname, std::string& detname, bool en, int ped, int pol, int off, double freq);
00058   void Add(WireMap&, int index);
00059 
00060   // Unique fixes for certain runs
00061   // Hardcoded for now
00062   void UniqueFixes();
00063 
00064 private:
00065   // Add individual elements
00066   void AddBank(const std::string&); // Increments fNDets; others do not
00067   void AddDet(const std::string&);
00068   void AddEnabled(bool);
00069   void AddPedestal(int);
00070   void AddPolarity(int);
00071   void AddOffset(int);
00072   void AddFrequency(double);
00073 
00074 public:
00075   // Load the ODB values, or load over with
00076   // another WireMap in the same way that
00077   // ODBEdit does
00078   void Load(int run, const std::string& odb_file);
00079   void LoadOver(WireMap&);
00080   void Clear();
00081 
00082   // Resize all vectors to size of banks by trimming
00083   // and/or bloating. This should never be necessary.
00084   void ResizeToBanks();
00085   // Check for duplicates that are both enabled
00086   // and remove the duplicates that are disabled
00087   bool AreThereDuplicates();
00088   void ClearDisabledDuplicateDetectors();
00089 
00090   // Return default WireMap
00091   // This is what the first run of alcapana saw as a default
00092   // Got from loading the ODB files in analyzer/odb/ in
00093   // alphabeticla order
00094   static WireMap Default();
00095 
00096 private:
00097   // Checks extension for 'odb'
00098   // Any other format returns false.
00099   static bool IsODBFile(const std::string& fname);
00100   // Determines the number of elements in an ODB key's
00101   // array; assumes the line is of the form
00102   // VARIABLE = TYPE [##] :
00103   // This method return ##
00104   // It must be passed only the part of the line
00105   // (including single leading space)
00106   //  = TYPE [##] :
00107   static int GetArraySize(const char (&tmp)[256]);
00108   // Get the key
00109   static key_t GetKey(std::string&);
00110 
00111 public:
00112   void Print();
00113 };
